com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps

Class TrackingSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.TrackingSettings

  • public class TrackingSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Settings for the user location and bearing tracking of a MapboxMap.

    • Method Detail

      • setMyLocationTrackingMode

        public void setMyLocationTrackingMode(int myLocationTrackingMode)

        Set the current my location tracking mode.

        Will enable my location if not active.

        See MyLocationTracking for different values.
        Parameters:
        myLocationTrackingMode - The location tracking mode to be used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if no suitable permission is present
        See Also:
        MyLocationTracking

      • getMyLocationTrackingMode

        public int getMyLocationTrackingMode()
        Returns the current user location tracking mode.
        Returns:
        The current user location tracking mode. One of the values from MyLocationTracking.Mode.
        See Also:
        MyLocationTracking.Mode

      • setMyBearingTrackingMode

        public void setMyBearingTrackingMode(int myBearingTrackingMode)

        Set the current my bearing tracking mode.

        Shows the direction the user is heading.

        When location tracking is disabled the direction of UserLocationView is rotated When location tracking is enabled the MapView is rotated based on bearing value.

        See MyBearingTracking for different values.
        Parameters:
        myBearingTrackingMode - The bearing tracking mode to be used.
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if no suitable permission is present
        See Also:
        MyBearingTracking

      • getMyBearingTrackingMode

        public int getMyBearingTrackingMode()
        Returns the current user bearing tracking mode. See MyBearingTracking for possible return values.
        Returns:
        the current user bearing tracking mode.
        See Also:
        MyBearingTracking

      • isDismissTrackingOnGesture

        public boolean isDismissTrackingOnGesture()
        Returns if the tracking modes will be dismissed when a gesture occurs.
        Returns:
        True to indicate the tracking modes will be dismissed.

      • setDismissTrackingOnGesture

        public void setDismissTrackingOnGesture(boolean dismissTrackingOnGesture)
        Set the dismissal of the tracking modes if a gesture occurs.
        Parameters:
        dismissTrackingOnGesture - True to dismiss the tracking modes.

      • isLocationTrackingDisabled

        public boolean isLocationTrackingDisabled()
        Return if location tracking is disabled
        Returns:
        True if location tracking is disabled.
